text: email is going to be way harder than HubSpot, if you’re not an email person to begin with. let me think on this a bit. not sure i can do anything to help by tomorrow; i’m booked tonight
it might be best to look for a similar pre-built template and start with that, and talk about iterations later. or try to get an extension on your deadline.

i think for now im going to go the route of modifying a prebuilt, and just comment notes for myself as i change things so i get the hang of what works for now. thank you again <@UDEASNWEB> for your help and advice.
